description: The case for a bounce-back rests in part on China’s tech prowess. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Have we reached peak pessimism on China?
title_page: Have we reached peak pessimism on China? | The Straits Times
maintext:
China fell off “the miracle path” years ago and now, many are catching up to the story.
An ageing population, high debt levels and a meddling government are turning the country into a fading power like Japan of the 1990s, when its economy slowed sharply but avoided an outright crisis.
